_header: Man which Adam sin made thrall / Who made us free thou heardest tell
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Annunciation, feast of
_description: Gospel for the Feast of the Annunciation, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
MOn whon Adames synne mad þralleWho made þe fre þou
                    herdest telle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…þat may we seo beo a ladiÞat was saued þorwh
                    hire merci
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Missus est Angelus Gabriel a deo in ciuitatem (f.
                    168vc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Manne whilk adam synne made thrallWho made vs fre herd haue we
                    all…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat maie ȝe se be a ladyeþat was sauid
                    þorghe hir mercie
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Luk þis day schewes þe begynyngOf oure fredam in
                    oure bying…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat may be se by a ladyÞat was saued thorewe hire
                    mercy
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: In Annunciacione beate Marie secundum Lucam (p. 167)

CULDd11.First Lines:
MAn whom Adames synne made bondeWho made the fre þu has
                    vnderstonde…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And þer for helpiþ sche hem alleÞat hertili on
                    hire wile calle
CULDd11.Note:
Division between this and following 2758 occurs two lines earlier in this MS, so that 1641
                    begins ‘That we may seen…’.
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
In Annunciacione beate marie Euangelium secundum Lucam. Missus est
                        angelus Gabriel a deo in Ciuitatem Galilee etc. (f. 110)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Luke leres vnto vs allWho made us fre when we war thrall…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat may men here now by a taleand for hir sake say it I sale
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Missus est Angelus gabriel & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In festo Annunciacionis beate Marie (rubric, f. 146vb)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Thou man whanne adam syn made thrallWhat made ye fre you has harde
                    all…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That may yhe se by a ladyThat was saued thurgh hir
                    mercy

MinULZ822.First Lines:
O man wham adam syne made thrallWha mad vs fre we han harde tell
                    all…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe se be a ladyþat was sayuede thurght
                    hyre mercy
MinULZ822.Attributed Title: In annunciacio de domina Secundum Lucam (f. 69)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Man whom Adam syn made þrellHow made þe fre þu
                    hauyst herd tell…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…þat may we se by a leuedyþat wos sauyd þroght
                    hys mercy
